definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
a steady flow (idiom); an unending stream

pinyin: chang2 liu2 shui3 , bu4 duan4 xian4

sentences.english: Time is not on our side. We need to keep moving forward and we need to move fast.
sentences.chinese: 時不我待，我們必須不斷前進，行動迅速。

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物複種方式不斷優化，複種指數呈波動式增長。

sentences.english: It symbolizes good fortune, Gangnam civil called "the head of wealth."
sentences.chinese: 它象徵着吉祥，江南民間稱之爲“富貴不斷頭”。

sentences.english: As you can tell, she is STILL in heavy demand even after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 即使這麼多年後，楊紫瓊仍然片約不斷。

sentences.english: Roofless towers appeared and disappeared, thrusting blindly upward.
sentences.chinese: 無頂的塔不斷顯現又隱匿，盲目的直插雲霄。

sentences.english: But we are a very analytically driven business.
sentences.chinese: 我們是不斷去分析的企業。

sentences.english: And they should carry on the self-innovation constantly and pay attention to form the fund brand.
sentences.chinese: 並且要不斷進行自我創新，注重打造基金品牌。

sentences.english: That is the reason he must change partners endlessly.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲什麼他會不斷的更換伴侶。

sentences.english: However, Intel constantly introduces correctives in its plans.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英特爾不斷推出糾偏，在其計劃。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能夠反覆感染我們的原因在於病毒的不斷變化。

sentences.english: This part faces the reality that history often repeats itself.
sentences.chinese: 這部分是關於直面歷史不斷重演的事實。

sentences.english: As your sense of self-trust increases, so will your sense of self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 當你不斷地相信自己，你就會感到自信。

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 積分制，會員制不斷出臺穩定消費羣。

sentences.english: My wife keeps pecking at me.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆不斷地挑我的毛病。

sentences.english: The Prison University Project has expanded under Ms. Lewen's leadership.
sentences.chinese: 在盧恩女士的領導下，這個監獄大學項目不斷擴展。

sentences.english: They should also be constantly concerned in taking care and cleaning their stoma .
sentences.chinese: 他們還應該不斷關注，在照顧和清潔他們的氣孔。

definition: one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
at any time/at all times/at the right time
